Hero.name: Sohaib Ahrich
Hero.description: I build modern, fast, and beautiful web experiences — focusing on clean code, performance, and design that feels alive.

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: Passionate Developer Creating Impactful Digital Experiences
About.p1: I’m a full-stack developer with a deep love for clean design, powerful performance, and intuitive UX. My mission is to create seamless web experiences that feel effortless.
About.p2: With expertise in technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind, I craft products that are not only functional but also delightful to use — bridging creativity and engineering.
About.p3: Outside of coding, I’m passionate about learning new frameworks, exploring design trends, and contributing to open-source projects that push the web forward.
